authors.name: Nicholas Sherman
authors.affiliation: University of Virginia Biomolecular Analysis Facility Core

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"bm8vp","text":"These steps represent a starting point for analysis of metabolomics data. Other data analysis and/or packages may be used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"2t3ps","text":"Tsugawa H, Cajka T, Kind T, Ma Y, Higgins B, Ikeda K, Kanazawa M, VanderGheynst J, Fiehn O, Arita M. MS-DIAL: data-independent MS/MS deconvolution for comprehensive metabolome analysis. Nat Methods. 2015 Jun;12(6):523-6. doi: 10.1038/nmeth.3393. Epub 2015 May 4. PMID: 25938372; PMCID: PMC4449330.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7one","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6cbo8","text":"Pang, Z., Lu, Y., Zhou, G., Hui, F., Xu, L., Viau, C., Spigelman, A., MacDonald, P., Wishart, D., Li, S., and Xia, J. (2024) MetaboAnalyst 6.0: towards a unified platform for metabolomics data processing, analysis and interpretation Nucleic Acids Research (doi: 10.1093/nar/gkae253)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":233,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":125,"length":107}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6BD6F58616CA11EF8B840A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1093/nar/gkae253"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"asbed","text":"Thermo RAW files are organized in two folders - one for all positive mode raw files and another for all negative mode raw files. These files will be loaded into MS-DIAL in two separate searches. Download MSP library files for Positive and Negative mode and save them in a folder in the computer you are using to perform the searches.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq83","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dtn9h","text":"Project file path: Browse the folder with Positive or Negative raw files","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1uv67","text":"Ionization type: Soft ionization (LC-MSMS)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jjng","text":"Separation type: Chromatography (LC)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjc00","text":"MS method type: Conventional LC/MS or data dependent MS/MS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ae5m8","text":"Data type: MS1 Profile, MS/MS Centroid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1um3","text":"Ion mode: Positive or Negative","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1s51m","text":"Target omics: Metabolomics","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"607ni","text":"Click \"Next\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12eol","text":"Analysis file path: browse to the folder with raw files, select all the apply for the search. Should include at least 3 blanks and 3 QC runs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8607f","text":"Choose the file type for each sample (Blank, QC, sample)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9399f","text":"Class ID - add short group names for each replicate without adding numbers among replicates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"75v6v","text":"Data collection tab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j5d7","text":"Mass accuracy: MS1 tolerance 0.01 Da, MS2 tolerance 0.025 Da","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"te8u","text":" - Advanced:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqckl","text":"Data collection parameters: retention time begin 0 min, retention time end 15 min, MS1 range begin 50 Da, MS1 range end 1000 Da, MSMS range begin 50 Da, MSMS range end 1000 Da, Isotope recognition: max charge number 2.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e88ve","text":"Peak Detection tab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97t0e","text":"Peak detection parameters: minimum peak height 10000 amplitude, mass slice 0.1 Da","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6qcq","text":"- Advanced:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k0jt","text":"Smoothing method: linear weighted moving average","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cmhs6","text":"Smoothing level: 3 scan","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9dnb","text":"Minimum peak width: 5 scan","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c9mk4","text":"MS2Dec tab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3mphh","text":"Deconvolution parameters: sigma window value 0.5, MS2 abundance cut off 10 amplitude.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d61ui","text":"- Advanced:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"63d6b","text":"Check Exclude after precursor ion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67h1j","text":"Keep the isotope ions until 0.5 Da","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7aav","text":"Check Keep the isotopic ions w/o MS2Dec","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6h81r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1i6nk","text":"Identification tab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34jdm","text":"MSP file and MS/MS identification setting: add MSP file downloaded Positive or Negative depending on the data that you loaded in the step 04. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drq61","text":"Retention time tolerance: 100 min, Accurate mass tolerance (MS1) 0.01  Da, Accurate mass tolerance MS/MS 0.05, Identification score cut off 80%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4n2lt","text":"- Advanced:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3o4dp","text":" add txt file of an in-house library Positive or Negative depending on the data that you loaded in the step 04. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52crl","text":"Retention time tolerance: 0.1 min, Accurate mass tolerance 0.01  Da, Identification score cut off 85%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j4f6","text":"Check only report the top hit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6cpdo","text":"Alignment tab","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2db4o","text":"Alignment parameters settings: Under result name add a name for the alignment file, reference file choose one of the QC runs, retention time tolerance 0.05 min, MS1 tolerance 0.015 Da","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5shf2","text":"- Advanced:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mvbc","text":"Check remove feature based on blank information","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2khrr","text":"Check keep \"reference matched\" metabolite features","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7t9q","text":"Check keep ''suggested (w/o MS2)\" metabolite features","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12r2e","text":"Check keep removable features and assign the tag","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nf0e","text":"Check Gap filling by compulsion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aivqt","text":"At the bottom","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"606sm","text":"Check together with Alignment ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hb2","text":"Click \"Finish\" --\u003e processing will start.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92dj8","text":"Once the search is finished, click on the name of the file that is showing at the Alignment Navigator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"740lo","text":"Click Export - Alignment result, choose a folder to save the file, check remove features from blank, and export.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7oh8m","text":"Data can be loaded into Excel/R or any other software environment for further data analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"anhmi","text":"Data Analysis: load data into Excel, filter out: m/z match FALSE and identifcations named w/o MS2. Combine postive and negative identifications removing redundancy and save as txt file. Load the combined non-redundant data into R or the online MetaboAnalyst 6.0 tool. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Analysis parameter setting - keep default if not mentioned in this section
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6v6ss","text":" MetaboAnalyst 6.0 --\u003e statistical analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"oogp","text":"Upload .txt data as peak intensities (check file format), no data filtering, Sample normalization: normalization by median, Data transformation: Log transformation (base 10), no Data Scaling. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5q04f","text":"At this point there are distinct analyses that can be done, the following is provided by our core as a first-step analysis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f39vi","text":"Chemometrics analysis: PCA, PLS-DA with importance measures using VIP.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dggtg","text":"Univariate analysis: fold change and t-test -\u003e volcano plot (two groups comparisons).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78unj","text":"Clustering analysis: heatmap.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
